Inglewood.Kirk Douglas Theatre:
The Kirk Douglas Theatre is a 317-seat theater located in Culver City, California Since 2004 it has been operated by the Center Theatre Group.


== History ==
Built in 1946, as a Streamline Moderne movie palace with a seating capacity of 1,160 (on a stadium plan with no overhanging balcony), the Culver Theatre (as it was previously named) was located near the Columbia Pictures studio lot (then the lot for MGM). It opened on August 13, 1946.
